name: Nigerian Local Rice (50kg)
description: Premium quality Nigerian local rice, stone-free and well-processed. Perfect for jollof rice and other Nigerian dishes.

name: Semolina (10kg)
description: High-quality semolina flour for making tuwo, couscous, and other delicious meals.

name: Palm Oil (25 Litres)
description: Pure red palm oil, rich in vitamins and perfect for authentic Nigerian cooking.

name: Brown Beans (50kg)
description: Premium brown beans, carefully selected and processed. Great for moi moi, akara, and beans porridge.

name: Garri (25kg)
description: Fresh and crunchy garri made from high-quality cassava. Perfect for drinking or eating.

name: Groundnut Oil (25 Litres)
description: Pure groundnut oil extracted from quality groundnuts. Ideal for frying and cooking.

name: Plantain Flour (5kg)
description: Nutritious plantain flour, gluten-free and perfect for making swallow and baking.

name: Dried Fish (Assorted)
description: Assorted dried fish including croaker, catfish, and mackerel. Properly smoked and preserved.

name: Crayfish (Ground) - 2kg
description: Freshly ground crayfish, adds authentic Nigerian flavor to your soups and stews.

name: Yam Flour (Elubo) - 10kg
description: Premium yam flour for making amala. Smooth texture and authentic taste guaranteed.

name: Honey (Pure) - 1 Litre
description: 100% pure natural honey, unprocessed and rich in nutrients. Great for health and cooking.

name: Tiger Nuts (Fresh) - 5kg
description: Fresh tiger nuts, carefully selected and cleaned. Perfect for making kunun aya or eating fresh.
